Package org.cesecore.keys.validation

Interface CertificateProfileAwareValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Profile, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CertificateValidator, DnsNameValidator, KeyValidator, Validator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertificateValidatorBase, EccKeyValidator, ExternalCommandCertificateValidator, KeyValidatorBase, PublicKeyBlacklistKeyValidator, RsaKeyValidator, ValidatorBase
    public interface CertificateProfileAwareValidator
extends Profile
    Base validator interface that contains references to certificate profiles.
    Version:
    $Id: CertificateProfileAwareValidator.java 27527 2017-12-12 15:49:13Z mikekushner $

      • isAllCertificateProfileIds

        boolean isAllCertificateProfileIds()
        If the validator should apply to All certificate profiles.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • setAllCertificateProfileIds

        void setAllCertificateProfileIds​(boolean isAll)
        Sets if validation should be performed for all certificate profile ids.
        Parameters:
